```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r, flippers, echo=FALSE}

inputPanel(
  
  selectInput(inputId = "pick_spp",
              label = "Pick your penguin species:",
              choices = c("Adelie", "Chinstrap", "Gentoo"))
  
)

```
